name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
description:
Combat Action: When Kaedehara Kazuha is your active character, equip this card.
After Kaedehara Kazuha equips this card, he will immediately use Chihayaburu once.
After Kaedehara Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)
(You must have Kaedehara Kazuha in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1505]</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After $[A1505] equips this card, he will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15052]</color> once.
After $[A1505] triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)
(You must have $[A1505] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kaedehara Kazuha</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After Kaedehara Kazuha equips this card, he will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> once.
After Kaedehara Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)
(You must have Kaedehara Kazuha in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext:
There is something elegant about this match.
If nothing else, both sides may concede defeat without regrets.
source: Reward for inviting Kaedehara Kazuha to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
